meanings.definition: A serum containing antibodies that is used to treat or provide immunity against specific diseases.
meanings.sent1: The doctor administered antiserums to the patient to help fight off the infection.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stored various antiserums to quickly treat any new cases of the disease.
meanings.sent3: The antiserums in the fridge were like the superheroes ready to protect the body from harm.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as an antiserum against the negativity surrounding her.
meanings.sent5: The antiserums worked like tiny soldiers, battling the illness within the body.
